text: Allāh ettakaiyavaṉ eṉṟāl avaṉ tāṉ vāṉaṅkaḷaiyum, pūmiyaiyum paṭaittu vāṉattiliruntu maḻaiyaiyum poḻiyac ceytu ataik koṇṭu kaṉivarkkaṅkaḷaiyum uṅkaḷukku - ākāramāka veḷippaṭuttit taṉ kaṭṭaḷaiyiṉāl kaṭalil cellumāṟu kappalai uṅkaḷukku vacappaṭuttik koṭuttum, āṟukaḷaiyum uṅkaḷukku vacappaṭuttittantāṉ
